member.name: M:Atom.Relational.StandardDbContext.#ctor(Microsoft.EntityFrameworkCore.DbContextOptions)
M:Atom.Relational.StandardDbContext.SaveChangesAsync(System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.summary: Saves all changes made in this context to the database. This method will automatically call Microsoft.EntityFrameworkCore.ChangeTracking.ChangeTracker.DetectChanges to discover any changes to entity instances before saving to the underlying database. This can be disabled via Microsoft.EntityFrameworkCore.ChangeTracking.ChangeTracker.AutoDetectChangesEnabled. Multiple active operations on the same context instance are not supported. Use 'await' to ensure that any asynchronous operations have completed before calling another method on this context.
member.param: A System.Threading.CancellationToken to observe while waiting for the task to complete.

member.name: M:Atom.Relational.StandardDbContext.OnModelCreating(Microsoft.EntityFrameworkCore.ModelBuilder)
member.summary: Override this method to further configure the model that was discovered by convention from the entity types exposed in Microsoft.EntityFrameworkCore.DbSet`1 properties on your derived context. The resulting model may be cached and re-used for subsequent instances of your derived context.
